name: Citizens Community Bancorp, Inc.
description: Citizens Community Bancorp, Inc. is a community-oriented financial institution headquartered in Eau Claire, Wisconsin. Founded in 1932, the company operates as the holding company for Citizens Community Federal N.A., which offers a wide range of banking products and services to individual and business customers. Citizens Community Bancorp focuses on providing personalized banking solutions, including savings accounts, checking accounts, loans, and mortgages with an emphasis on meeting the unique needs of the communities it serves. The bank prides itself on its commitment to local communities, offering financial education and supporting local initiatives. With branches across Wisconsin and Minnesota, Citizens Community Bancorp aims to foster economic growth and stability in the regions it operates. The company leverages innovative technology to enhance customer experience, providing online banking, mobile banking, and other digital solutions that allow customers to manage their finances conveniently. As a public company, Citizens Community Bancorp is dedicated to maintaining transparency and accountability to its shareholders while continuing to grow and adapt to the changing financial landscape.

seo.meta_title: Citizens Community Bancorp, Inc. | Community Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Learn about Citizens Community Bancorp, Inc., a community-focused financial institution providing banking solutions in Wisconsin and Minnesota. Explore our services, commitment to local communities, and investor information.

faq.question: What services does Citizens Community Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: Citizens Community Bancorp offers a variety of banking services, including personal and business accounts, loans, and mortgages.

faq.question: Where is Citizens Community Bancorp located?
faq.answer: Citizens Community Bancorp is headquartered in Eau Claire, Wisconsin.

faq.question: When was Citizens Community Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: Citizens Community Bancorp was founded in 1932.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Citizens Community Bancorp?
faq.answer: Stephen J. Barlow is the CEO of Citizens Community Bancorp, Inc.
